name: Superstore Dashboard
description: Monitoring Superstore's number of items sold and revenues per category, sub-category, and product using stacked bar chart, table chart, and area chart.

name: E-commerce Logs Dashboard
description: Monitoring e-commerce logs per country, languages, and network protocol using bubble map chart and line chart.

name: Superstore Dashboard (Static)
description: Monitoring Superstore's YoY number of items sold, revenues, and profit using line chart and table chart.

name: Superstore Dashboard (Dynamic)
description: Monitoring Superstore's number of orders, revenues, and profit per region, state, category, sub-category using line chart, stacked bar chart, and table chart.

name: New York City AirBnB Open Data
description: Mapping out New York City AirBnB's per filter applied (area, room type, minimum nights, number of reviews) using dot density map chart, heat map chart, and table chart.

name: Coronavirus Case and Vaccine Dashboard
description: Mapping out countries in terms of coronavirus cases and vaccinations severities using bubble map chart, choropleth map chart, and table chart.

name: Android Games Statistical Dashboard
description: Showing statistical metrics of the top Android Games using bar chart, area chart, and table chart.

name: Heart Attack Patients Health Parameter Visualization
description: Showing statistical comparison between parameters of heart attack patients using pie chart and stacked bar chart
